awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 15 wins & 25 nominations.

fullplot: Juliette was 15 years in prison. Confronted with the unexpected goodness of her younger sister Lèa, who makes Juliette a part of her family, very slowly breaks up Juliette's ice and bitterness and she carefully opens up.
plot: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.
title: I've Loved You So Long

tomatoes.consensus: I've Loved You So Long is a sublimely acted family drama as well as a noteworthy directorial debut from Phillipe Claudel.
